## auth.BaseAuth.updateUser() method

Updates an existing user.

See \[Update a user\](/docs/auth/admin/manage-users\#update\_a\_user) for code samples and detailed documentation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateUser(uid: string, properties: UpdateRequest): Promise<UserRecord>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  uid | string | The <code>uid</code> corresponding to the user to update. |
|  properties | [UpdateRequest](./firebase-admin.auth.updaterequest.md) | The properties to update on the provided user. A promise fulfilled with the updated user data. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[UserRecord](./firebase-admin.auth.userrecord.md)<!-- -->&gt;
